addonCore.label: Rotman Trader Toolbox
addonCore.summary: Rotman Trader Toolbox provides functionality for connecting MATLAB(R) to Rotman Interactive Trader
addonCore.description:
Rotman Trader Toolbox allows you to connect to Rotman Interactive Trader from MATLAB(R). From within MATLAB, you can retrieve information in real-time as well as submit trading orders. You can build an interactive or fully automated trading system in MATLAB for use with Rotman Interactive Trader.
Other Requirements
Note that you will need to download and install Rotman Interactive Trader to use this functionality.
